valuation_report.report_reference: CM/2025/SP/Reddys Pharma Limited-PC VAR RB Pe] Nn k
valuation_report.client_address: 1 Park Avenue, First Parklands Avenue P.O Box 30238 - 00100, GPO, Nairobi Kenya

title_details.survey_map_reference: Sheet No.161/3, 4, 162/3, 172/2 & 173/1 of Kajiado/Dalalekutuk registration section together with Inset Sheet No. 2

property_description.land_use: Agricultural with potential for mixed use purposes.
property_description.plot_shape: Almost L-shaped black cotton soil parcel with gentle southward slope
property_description.vegetation: Natural grass vegetation and thorny shrubs

market_assessment.neighbourhood_character: Similar vacant parcels of land with sparse and scattered physical developments, mostly used as grazing fields, with future development potential for subdivision.
market_assessment.infrastructure_availability: Not connected with basic infrastructural services (water, electricity). Rudimentary road network.
market_assessment.land_market_trend: Modest, common with large land holdings for market speculation and land banking.
market_assessment.economic_impact: Subdued due to depressed economy, high interest rates, and low capital inflows.
market_assessment.environmental_issues: No developments or environmental issues including contaminated land affecting value.
market_assessment.public_use_status: Not set aside for public use, not in Ndung’u report as irregularly acquired or allocated.
